it.polimi.se2019.network.socket.server

Class SocketClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.network.socket.server.SocketClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientConnection, java.lang.Runnable

    public class SocketClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ClientConnection
    manages the connection with a specific client
